name: adoptable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If an animal or child is adoptable, they are available or suitable for adoption (= being permanently taken into someone's home as part of their family): At her clinic, she taught undisciplined dogs to behave better so they would be adoptable. When he was 8, he appeared on a 1980s TV show featuring adoptable children. Opposite
unadoptable
More examplesFewer examplesThe animal control shelter has a special room to showcase adoptable dogs. The charity helps make many kids with health conditions more adoptable by paying for medical care. The website includes pictures of adoptable special needs kids in many different areas.Shelters rely on volunteers to raise underage kittens and puppies to an adoptable age.
